attributes.action: Make it compulsory for all UK companies to state on their products whether the products are suitable for vegetarians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a vegetarian I do not wish to use products of any kind which animals have died to produce or been subject to cruel and unnecessary vivisection procedures. All UK companies should be required, by law, to print a mandatory message on all their products which state (a) That they contain no animal products which are unsuitable for vegetarians; and (b) That no animals have been tortured or killed in the manufacture of this product. Companies who print this message on their products should be regularly monitored to ensure they comply with the message. For companies who do NOT print this message on their products, it will be assumed that their products are NOT suitable for vegetarians.
